remark.ch: 生物科技及生物多樣性第二專長

goal.en: Understanding the mechanism of metabolism and lipid synthesis
goal.ch: 讓學生對於新陳代謝與脂質合成有更進一步的了解

content.en:
Week Date Topics Instructors
1 2/24 Introduction PY Wu
2 3/3 Chapter 12 Chemical Logic of Metabolism PY Wu
3 3/10 Chapter 13 Carbohydrate Metabolism: Glycolysis, Gluconeogenesis, Glycogen Metabolism, and the Pentose Phosphate Pathway PY Wu
4 3/17 Chapter 13 Carbohydrate Metabolism: Glycolysis, Gluconeogenesis, Glycogen Metabolism, and the Pentose Phosphate Pathway PY Wu
5 3/24 Chapter 13 Carbohydrate Metabolism: Glycolysis, Gluconeogenesis, Glycogen Metabolism, and the Pentose Phosphate Pathway PY Wu
6 3/31 Mid-term exam 1 PY Wu
7 4/7 Chapter 14 Citric Acid Cycle and Glyoxylate Cycle PY Wu
8 4/14 Chapter 14 Citric Acid Cycle and Glyoxylate Cycle PY Wu
9 4/21 Chapter 15?? Electron Transport, Oxidative Phosphorylation, and Oxygen Metabolism PY Wu
10 4/28 Chapter 15?? Electron Transport, Oxidative Phosphorylation, and Oxygen Metabolism PY Wu
11 5/5 Chapter 15?? Electron Transport, Oxidative Phosphorylation, and Oxygen Metabolism PY Wu
12 5/12 Mid-term exam 2 PY Wu
13 5/19 Chapter 17 Lipid Metabolism I: Fatty Acids, Triacylglycerols, and Lipoproteins CY Nien
14 5/26 Chapter 17 Lipid Metabolism I: Fatty Acids, Triacylglycerols, and Lipoproteins CY Nien
15 6/2 Chapter 18 Interorgan and Intracellular Coordination of Energy Metabolism in Vertebrates CY Nien
16 6/9 Chapter 19 Lipid Metabolism II: Membrane Lipids, Steroids, Isoprenoids, and Eicosanoids CY Nien
17 6/16 Chapter 19 Lipid Metabolism II: Membrane Lipids, Steroids, Isoprenoids, and Eicosanoids CY Nien
18 6/23 Final exam CY Nien

textbook.en: Biochemistry (4 th Ed) by Mathews, Van Holde, Appling, and Anthony-Cahill

grading.en: 期中考-1 30％, 期中考-2 30％, 期末考 30％, 出席與回饋 10％ 期末總成績結算時，授課教師得視學生整體學習情況，統一酌予調整分數
